snippet: Holiday meals typically have an unpredictable riot of dishes, making precise pairings of wine and food difficult, if not impossible.
abstract: Eric Asimov Wines of The Times column tastes selection of red, white, rose and sparkling wines under $25 to go with Thanksgiving dinner; tasting report.
lead_paragraph: Holiday meals typically have an unpredictable riot of dishes, making precise pairings of wine and food difficult, if not impossible.

headline.print_headline: Making Friends Easily at a Crowded Table
headline.seo: Wines That Make Friends Easily at a Crowded Thanksgiving Table
headline.main: Wines That Make Friends Easily at a Crowded Thanksgiving Table
